title: Bilenky Cycle Works builds a custom bike for British Prime Minister, gifted by President Biden
content:
As a small frame builder, if you got a request from the government out of the blue to build a special bike for an undisclosed client, would you believe it? That was the situation Stephen Bilenky of Bilenky Cycle Works found himself in, after being approached by the U.S. Department of State. The ask? Build [â€¦]

The post Bilenky Cycle Works builds a custom bike for British Prime Minister, gifted by President Biden appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
